backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining nakshatra calculations, user profiles, and logs with access control mixin and helper utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend fixes, involved files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions summarizing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, setting dark mode root class, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/alerts/AlertsTog: UI switch component tied to nakshatra alert settings using a custom bell glyph.
frontend/src/components/alerts/Nakshatra: Banner showing nakshatra change alerts with shift glyph, summary text, and dismiss button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and clearing queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper that shows a sign‑in card when unauthenticated and otherwise renders children.
Modal for selecting a city or using geolocation, with search filtering and error handling.
frontend/src/components/errors/Connectio: Displays a connection failure message with retry button and optional error details.
frontend/src/components/glyphs/Glyph.tsx: Renders various custom SVG glyph icons based on a type prop.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation header with links, city picker trigger, alerts toggle, and login button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout wrapper providing header, routed content area, and footer with version info.
frontend/src/components/nakshatra/Naksha: Clickable card displaying summary info for a nakshatra and linking to its detail page.
Displays detailed nakshatra info including symbols, deity, ruler, themes, and traits in cards and accordions.
frontend/src/components/nakshatra/Transi: Calculates and displays estimated times for next pada and nakshatra transitions based on current city timezone.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyGuida: Renders collapsible guidance modules for a given Nakshatra using daily content fields. Each module displays a themed section with an icon and text.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyInter: Displays detailed daily interpretation blocks including emotional climate and a narrative 'day in the life' section for the selected Nakshatra.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyLogsP: Provides forms for submitting daily check-ins, sleep logs, and dream logs with sliders and text inputs, saving data via custom hooks.
frontend/src/components/today/ResonanceS: Shows whether the current Nakshatra resonates with the user's birth chart and displays moon or atmakaraka activation messages.
frontend/src/data/cities.ts: Exports a list of major cities with names, timezones, and coordinates, along with a City interface.
Defines daily content structure and provides detailed daily descriptions for Nakshatras like Ashwini and Bharani.
frontend/src/data/nakshatras.ts: Defines Nakshatra metadata including traits, symbolism, deity, and padas, and exports a full list of Nakshatras.
frontend/src/hooks/actorQueryKey.ts: Utility to generate stable query keys for authenticated and anonymous users based on principal identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorInitStatus.ts: Provides read‑only status and retry controls for the actor initialization query.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorStable.ts: Builds a stable actor instance keyed by principal and initializes it with an optional admin token.
frontend/src/hooks/useCitySelection.ts: Manages selected city with validation, localStorage syncing, and live local‑time updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Wraps Internet Identity auth flow, exposing identity, login/logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: Syncs state with localStorage across tabs and hook instances with subscriber notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useNakshatraAlerts.ts: Tracks nakshatra changes and shows an alert banner when the current nakshatra differs from the last seen one.
frontend/src/hooks/useNakshatraNow.ts: Computes current lunar longitude for the selected city and fetches the corresponding nakshatra.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Queries the backend for the current nakshatra using the actor, validating longitude and exposing retry helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserLogs.ts: React-query hooks for fetching and saving user logs, grouped by day, nakshatra, and type, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks to load and update the caller's user profile and birth chart using react-query with cache updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables, typography, and layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/astro/lunarLongitude.ts: Computes an approximate lunar longitude using a simplified astronomical formula.
frontend/src/lib/diagnostics/nakshatraDi: Helpers for logging nakshatra-related errors and validating/normalizing lunar longitude values.
frontend/src/lib/diagnostics/sanitizeErr: Utility to safely convert unknown error values into readable strings.
frontend/src/lib/insights/dreamThemeExtr: Extracts per-nakshatra dream themes by counting entries and deriving unique keywords.
frontend/src/lib/insights/nakshatraInsig: Generates up to three insights from check-in, sleep, and dream logs based on repeated nakshatra patterns.
frontend/src/lib/nakshatra/index.ts: Provides helpers for generating and resolving nakshatra slugs.
frontend/src/lib/time/timezone.ts: Utilities for formatting dates and computing wall-clock times in specific timezones.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, react-query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryInsightsPage.t: Authenticated page that loads user logs, generates insights and dream themes, and displays them in tabbed sections or shows placeholders when empty.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBasePage.tsx: Displays searchable list of nakshatras with a filterable input and renders matching items from data.
frontend/src/pages/NakshatraDetailPage.t: Shows detailed view of a selected nakshatra using its slug, with number, themes, and structured sections, or a not-found screen.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSettingsPage.t: Authenticated profile page allowing users to edit account info and birth chart details, loading and saving data via hooks.
frontend/src/pages/TodayPage.tsx: Determines the current nakshatra using location and user data, handles errors and loading states, and displays daily interpretations and logs.
frontend/src/pages/TomorrowPage.tsx: Calculates tomorrow’s lunar longitude, determines the nakshatra, manages validation/error states, and shows interpretation content.
frontend/src/pages/VisualStyleSystemPage: Empty page placeholder for visual style system.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, container settings, shadows, and animations using plugins and custom CSS variables.
project_state.json: Project state metadata defining features, issues, and requested improvements related to fixing actor initialization and connection failures.
